verses.text:
Go ye into the world, and preach the gospel to every creature.
Go! bid the world in sin and shame, That blind world wake up and see!
Bid them the word of God regard; What form and beauty from its face! Bid them the word of God regard.

Go bid the world in sin and shame, That blind world wake up and see!
Bid them the word of God regard; What form and beauty from its face!
Bid them the word of God regard.

Go bid the world in sin and shame, That blind world wake up and see!
Bid them the word of God regard; What form and beauty from its face!
Bid them the word of God regard.
